mapper.insert: insert into user ( id, role_id, username, password, regist_time, login_time, login_ip )values( #{id}, #{role_id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{regist_time}, #{login_time}, #{login_ip} )
mapper.update: update user set role_id = #{role_id}, username = #{username}, password = #{password}, regist_time = #{regist_time}, login_time = #{login_time}, login_ip = #{login_ip} where id = #{id}
